name: hibiscus
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a tropical plant or bush with large, brightly coloured flowers: Hibiscus is a genus of plants with member species often noted for their showy flowers.
anand purohit/Moment/GettyImages
a type of hibiscus with yellow flowers with a red spot, and red calyxes (= parts that cover and protect the petals as they are developing) that are used to make a type of tea: Hibiscus is an ingredient in many herbal teas. Berlin has many Turkish supermarkets selling goods from Turkey, such as pickled vegetables, hibiscus tea, dolmas and yogurt. Synonym
rosella
